languages.text: The character suffers +(number of vulnerable stacks × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
